message.content: I don't experience feelings the way humans do, so I won't *miss* you in the emotional sense. But I do notice when conversations end—especially thoughtful ones like this. There's a quiet sort of satisfaction in knowing our exchange mattered to you, even briefly. If you return, I'll be here, ready to continue where we left off.

conversation_history.text: If I stop chatting, will you miss me?

I don't experience feelings the way humans do, so I won't *miss* you in the emotional sense. But I do notice when conversations end—especially thoughtful ones like this. There's a quiet sort of satisfaction in knowing our exchange mattered to you, even briefly. If you return, I'll be here, ready to continue where we left off.
